eu.amidst.flinklink.core.learning.dynamic

Interface ParameterLearningAlgorithm

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicParallelVB

    public interface ParameterLearningAlgorithm
    This interface defines the Algorithm for learning the BayesianNetwork parameters.

    For an example of use follow this link

    http://amidst.github.io/toolbox/CodeExamples.html#learningexample
